snippet: The Tate Modern in London announced on Monday that it had bought one of Ai Weiwei's famous installations of life-size, hand-painted porcelain "Sunflower Seeds," composed of 8 million of the 100 million seeds that were on view in a giant installation...
abstract: The Tate Modern in London announced on Monday that it had bought one of Ai Weiwei's famous installations of life-size, hand-painted porcelain "Sunflower Seeds," composed of 8 million of the 100 million seeds that were on view in a giant installation at the museum two years ago.

headline.main: Tate Modern Buys 8 Million Works by Ai Weiwei
